refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: <<<<<<< HEAD ======= This is an Octave function. >>>>>>> 6bbb00d0f0128381ee95194cf7d008fb6504de7d This function returns the input data after reversing the bits of the indices and reordering the elements of the input array.
